trans-unit.source: Provides a control array of <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> controls.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce una matrice di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controlli.

trans-unit.source: The `ListViewArray` class provides an equivalent for the run-time functionality of a Visual Basic 6.0 `ListView` array.
trans-unit.target: Il `ListViewArray` classe fornisce un equivalente per la funzionalità in fase di esecuzione di Visual Basic 6.0 `ListView` matrice.

trans-unit.source: It does not provide the design-time features of a Visual Basic 6.0 control array.
trans-unit.target: Non fornisce le funzionalità in fase di progettazione di una matrice di controlli Visual Basic 6.0.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/add/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/add/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the label for an item is edited by the user.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando l'etichetta per un elemento viene modificata dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: The `AfterLabelEdit` event occurs when the user finishes modifying the text for an item.
trans-unit.target: Il `AfterLabelEdit` evento si verifica quando l'utente termina la modifica del testo per un elemento.

trans-unit.source: The new string that the user types for the item is passed to the event, and the event handler can reject the change.
trans-unit.target: La nuova stringa digitata dall'utente per l'elemento viene passata all'evento e il gestore dell'evento può rifiutare la modifica.

trans-unit.source: If the event handler rejects the change, the text reverts to the text as it was before the user began editing the item.
trans-unit.target: Se il gestore eventi rifiuta la modifica, il testo viene ripristinata al testo com'era prima che l'utente ha iniziato la modifica dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: In order for the `AfterLabelEdit` event to be raised, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A> control must be set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Affinché il `AfterLabelEdit` dell'evento, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A>controllo deve essere impostato su `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.ListView%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user starts editing the label of an item.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando l'utente inizia a modificare l'etichetta di un elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `BeforeLabelEdit` event occurs when the user starts modifying the text for an item.
trans-unit.target: Il `BeforeLabelEdit` evento si verifica quando l'utente inizia a modificare il testo di un elemento.

trans-unit.source: If the event handler cancels this event, the user cannot change the text.
trans-unit.target: Se il gestore dell'evento Annulla questo evento, l'utente non è possibile modificare il testo.

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to prevent the user from editing specific items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo evento per impedire all'utente di modificare gli elementi specifici di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control is set to `false`, the `BeforeLabelEdit` event is not raised; all user attempts to change item labels are automatically rejected.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>NFS è impostata su `false`, `BeforeLabelEdit` non viene generato l'evento; tutti i tentativi di utente di modificare le etichette degli elementi vengono rifiutati automaticamente.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.LabelEdit%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the contents of the display area for a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> in virtual mode has changed and the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> determines that a new range of items is needed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il contenuto dell'area di visualizzazione per un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> in modalità virtuale è stata modificata e <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> determina che è necessario un nuovo intervallo di elementi.

trans-unit.source: Handling this event enables the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to update the item information held in cache so that it is readily available.
trans-unit.target: Consente di gestire questo evento di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>di aggiornare le informazioni sull'elemento contenute nella cache in modo che sia immediatamente disponibile.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> in a <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray"></xref> is clicked.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> in un <xref href="Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray"> </xref> si fa clic.

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event passes a <xref:System.EventArgs> to its event handler.
trans-unit.target: Il `Click` evento passa un <xref:System.EventArgs>per il gestore dell'evento.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Therefore it only indicates that a click has occurred.
trans-unit.target: Pertanto indica solo che si è verificato un clic.

trans-unit.source: If you need more specific mouse information (button, number of clicks, wheel rotation, or location), use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick> event.
trans-unit.target: Se sono necessarie informazioni più specifiche di mouse (pulsante, numero di clic, alla rotazione della rotellina o alla posizione), utilizzare il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick>evento.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick> event will not be raised if the click is caused by action other than that of the mouse, such as pressing the ENTER key.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick>evento non essere generato se il clic è determinato da un'azione del mouse, ad esempio premendo il tasto INVIO.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseClick>

trans-unit.source: A double-click is determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system.
trans-unit.target: Un doppio clic è determinato dalle impostazioni relative al mouse del sistema operativo dell'utente.

trans-unit.source: The user can set the time between clicks of a mouse button that should be considered a double-click instead of two clicks.
trans-unit.target: L'utente può impostare l'intervallo tra i clic effettuati con un pulsante del mouse che deve essere considerato un doppio clic anziché come due clic distinti.

trans-unit.source: The `Click` event is raised every time that a control is double-clicked.
trans-unit.target: Il `Click` evento viene generato ogni volta che viene fatto doppio clic su un controllo.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you have event handlers for the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events of a [control](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), the `Click` and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> events are raised when the control is double-clicked and both methods are called.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si dispongono di gestori eventi per il `Click` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>gli eventi di un [controllo](ms-help://MS.VSCC.v90/MS.MSDNQTR.v90.en/fxref_system.windows.forms/html/6569d671-0a28-7b3f-dbb8-90c3d272b6e2.htm), `Click` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>vengono generati quando il controllo si fa doppio clic ed entrambi i metodi vengono chiamati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.source: If a control is double-clicked and that control does not support the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick> event, the `Click` event might be raised two times.
trans-unit.target: Se si fa doppio clic un controllo e che non supporta il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>evento, il `Click` evento potrebbe essere generato due volte.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoubleClick>

trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user clicks a column header within the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando l'utente fa clic su un'intestazione di colonna all'interno di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The `ColumnClick` event occurs when the user clicks one of the column headers in a details view of the items in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control (when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).
trans-unit.target: Il `ColumnClick` evento si verifica quando l'utente fa clic su una delle intestazioni di colonna in una visualizzazione di dettagli degli elementi in un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllo (quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>è impostata su <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View>).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.View> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The `ColumnClick` event is typically handled to sort the items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, using the clicked column as the column to sort by.
trans-unit.target: Il `ColumnClick` evento viene gestito in genere per ordinare gli elementi di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>, utilizzando la colonna selezionata come colonna per ordinare in base.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the column header order is changed.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene modificato l'ordine delle intestazioni di colonna.

trans-unit.source: The `ColumnReordered` event is a cancelable event and can be canceled by handling the event and setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Il `ColumnReordered` evento è un evento annullabile e può essere annullata la gestione dell'evento e l'impostazione di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>proprietà `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.FormCancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: However, if the event is canceled, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs> will not change to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> value.
trans-unit.target: Tuttavia, se l'evento viene annullato, il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>del <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs>non modificherà il il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A>valore.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.OldDisplayIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ColumnReorderedEventArgs.NewDisplayIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the details view of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*> property is set to <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando la visualizzazione dettagli di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> viene disegnato e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*>è impostata su <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw*>

trans-unit.source: This event lets you customize the appearance of a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control using owner drawing.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento consente di personalizzare l'aspetto di un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllo mediante il disegno personalizzato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: It is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to `View.Details`.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento viene generato solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>è impostata su `true` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>è impostata su `View.Details`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: This event can occur for each column header in the control.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento può verificarsi per ogni intestazione di colonna nel controllo.

trans-unit.source: For more information on owner drawing, see the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property reference topic.
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sul disegno personalizzato, vedere il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>argomento relativo alla proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: It is raised only when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A> property is set to `true` and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> property is set to `View.Details`.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento viene generato solo quando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>è impostata su `true` e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A>è impostata su `View.Details`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.View%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.OwnerDraw%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is entered.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene immesso il controllo.

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: `Enter` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: `Enter` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Quando si modifica lo stato attivo tramite la tastiera (TAB, MAIUSC + TAB e così via), oppure chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>(metodo), gli eventi di stato attivo si verificano nell'ordine seguente: `Enter` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>quando si modifica lo stato attivo usando il mouse o chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>(metodo), gli eventi di stato attivo si verificano nell'ordine seguente: `Enter` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave>Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs during a drag operation.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica durante un'operazione di trascinamento.

trans-unit.source: The `GiveFeedback` event is raised when a drag-and-drop operation is started.
trans-unit.target: Il `GiveFeedback` evento viene generato quando viene avviata un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: By using the `GiveFeedback` event, the source of a drag event can modify the appearance of the mouse pointer in order to give the user visual feedback during a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: Tramite il `GiveFeedback` evento, l'origine di un evento di trascinamento può modificare l'aspetto del puntatore del mouse per fornire l'utente indicazioni visive durante un'operazione di trascinamento e rilascio.

trans-unit.source: The `Item` property is the default property for a control array.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, the following lines of code are equivalent.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an item is activated.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un elemento viene attivato.

trans-unit.source: The `ItemActivate` event occurs when the user activates one or more items in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: Il `ItemActivate` evento si verifica quando l'utente attiva uno o più elementi nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The user can activate an item with either a single-click or double-click, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A> property, or with the keyboard.
trans-unit.target: L'utente può attivare un elemento con un singolo clic o fare doppio clic su, in base al valore di <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>, proprietà o con la tastiera.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.Activation%2A>

trans-unit.source: From within the event handler for the `ItemActivate` event, you can reference the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> properties to access the collection of items selected in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> to determine which items are being activated.
trans-unit.target: All'interno del gestore eventi per il `ItemActivate` evento, è possibile fare riferimento il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A>proprietà per accedere alla raccolta di elementi selezionati nel <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>per determinare quali elementi attivati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedIndices%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SelectedItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the user begins dragging an item.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando l'utente inizia a trascinare un elemento.

trans-unit.source: The `ItemDrag` event occurs when the user begins dragging an item.
trans-unit.target: Il `ItemDrag` evento si verifica quando l'utente inizia a trascinare un elemento.

trans-unit.source: Typically the event handler for the `ItemDrag` event performs the task of dragging by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: In genere il gestore eventi per il `ItemDrag` evento esegue l'operazione di trascinamento chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can use this event to perform the tasks necessary to drag items into and out of your application's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control.
trans-unit.target: È possibile utilizzare questo evento per eseguire le attività necessarie per trascinare gli elementi interno e all'esterno dell'applicazione <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: `KeyDown` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Chiavi eventi si verificano nell'ordine seguente: `KeyDown` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>per gestire gli eventi di tastiera solo a livello di modulo e non abilitare i controlli per la ricezione di eventi della tastiera, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>proprietà del modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>il metodo di gestione degli eventi per `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a key is pressed and the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando viene premuto un tasto e il controllo ha lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> `KeyPress` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> The `KeyPress` event is not raised by non-character keys; however, the non-character keys do raise the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> events.
trans-unit.target: Chiavi eventi si verificano nell'ordine seguente: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> `KeyPress` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>il `KeyPress` evento non viene generato da questi tasti; tuttavia, le chiavi non carattere generano il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp>eventi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyUp> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A> property to sample keystrokes at run time and to consume or modify a subset of common keystrokes.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>proprietà per campionare le sequenze di tasti in fase di esecuzione e per utilizzare o modificare un sottoinsieme di sequenze di tasti comuni.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.KeyChar%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Per gestire gli eventi di tastiera solo a livello di modulo e non abilitare i controlli per la ricezione di eventi della tastiera, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>proprietà del modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>il metodo di gestione degli eventi per `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Key events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> `KeyUp` To handle keyboard events only at the form level and not enable controls to receive keyboard events, set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> event-handling method to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Chiavi eventi si verificano nell'ordine seguente: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> `KeyUp` per gestire gli eventi di tastiera solo a livello di modulo e non abilitare i controlli per la ricezione di eventi della tastiera, impostare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A>proprietà del modulo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress>il metodo di gestione degli eventi per `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.KeyPressEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyPress> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.KeyDown>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a control should reposition its child controls.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando è necessario riposizionare i controlli figlio di un controllo.

trans-unit.source: The `Layout` event occurs when child controls are added or removed, when the bounds of the control changes, and when other changes occur that can affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il `Layout` evento si verifica quando i controlli figlio vengono aggiunti o rimossi, quando i limiti del controllo cambia e quando vengono apportate altre modifiche che possono influenzare il layout del controllo.

trans-unit.source: The layout event can be suppressed by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: L'evento layout può essere soppresso mediante il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A>metodi.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ResumeLayout%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SuspendLayout%2A>

trans-unit.source: Suspending layout enables you to perform multiple actions on a control without having to perform a layout for each change.
trans-unit.target: La sospensione del layout consente di eseguire più azioni su un controllo senza dover eseguire un layout per ogni modifica.

trans-unit.source: For example, if you resize and move a control, each operation would raise a `Layout` event.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, se si ridimensionare e spostare un controllo, ogni operazione genererebbe un `Layout` evento.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the input focus leaves the control.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando lo stato attivo viene spostato il controllo.

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Quando si modifica lo stato attivo tramite la tastiera (TAB, MAIUSC + TAB e così via), oppure chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>(metodo), gli eventi di stato attivo si verificano nell'ordine seguente: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> `Leave` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>quando si modifica lo stato attivo usando il mouse o chiamando il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>(metodo), gli eventi di stato attivo si verificano nell'ordine seguente: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> `Leave` per ulteriori informazioni sulla gestione degli eventi, vedere [eventi](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md). </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is clicked by the mouse.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il controllo viene selezionato con il mouse.

trans-unit.source: Clicking a mouse button when the pointer is over a shape typically raises the following series of events from the control: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseDown> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Click> `MouseClick` <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseUp> Two clicks that occur close enough in time, as determined by the mouse settings of the user's operating system, will generate an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> event instead of the second `MouseClick` event.
trans-unit.target: Fare clic su un pulsante del mouse quando il puntatore è posizionato su una forma in genere genera la seguente serie di eventi dal controllo: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseDown> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Click> `MouseClick` <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseUp>due clic distinti che si verificano in rapida sequenza, come determinato dalle impostazioni del mouse del sistema operativo dell'utente, verrà generato un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick>evento anziché il secondo `MouseClick` evento.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseDoubleClick> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseUp> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Click> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.MouseDown>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click> events are logically higher-level events of a control.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>eventi sono logicamente di livello superiore di un controllo.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Click>

trans-unit.source: They are often raised by other actions, such as pressing the ENTER key when the control has focus.
trans-unit.target: Vengono spesso generati da altre azioni, ad esempio premendo il tasto INVIO quando il controllo ha lo stato attivo.

trans-unit.source: For more information about how to handle events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the mouse pointer rests on the control.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il puntatore del mouse si sofferma sul controllo.

trans-unit.source: A typical use of `MouseHover` is to display a tool tip when the mouse pauses on a control within a specified area around the control (the "hover rectangle").
trans-unit.target: Un tipico utilizzo di `MouseHover` consiste nel visualizzare una descrizione comandi quando il puntatore del mouse si sofferma su un controllo all'interno di una determinata area intorno al controllo (il "area rettangolare").

trans-unit.source: The pause required for this event to be raised is specified in milliseconds by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Necessario generare questo evento viene specificato in millisecondi per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `MouseHover` event is defined and detected in connection with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Il `MouseHover` evento viene definito e rilevato in relazione la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverTime%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.SystemInformation.MouseHoverSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when an <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"></xref> is providing Help to accessibility applications.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject"> </xref> fornisce la Guida alle applicazioni di accessibilità.

trans-unit.source: You should use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> class to enable users to invoke Help on your accessible object by pressing the F1 key.
trans-unit.target: È consigliabile utilizzare la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>classe per consentire agli utenti di richiamare la Guida relativa all'oggetto accessibile premendo il tasto F1.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider> gives you complete information in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>Fornisce informazioni complete in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.QueryAccessibilityHelpEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the control is resized.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il controllo viene ridimensionato.

trans-unit.source: To determine the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> of the resized control, you can cast the `sender` parameter of the <xref:System.EventArgs> data to a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> and get its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> property (or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> properties individually).
trans-unit.target: Per determinare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>del controllo ridimensionato, è possibile eseguire il cast di `sender` parametro del <xref:System.EventArgs>dati da un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>e ottenere relativo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>proprietà (o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A>proprietà singolarmente).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Width%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Height%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control> </xref:System.EventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Size%2A>

trans-unit.source: To handle custom layouts, use the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout> event instead of the `Resize` event.
trans-unit.target: Per gestire layout personalizzati, utilizzare il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout>invece dell'evento di `Resize` eventi.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout> event is raised in response to a `Resize` event, but also in response to other changes that affect the layout of the control.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout>evento viene generato in risposta a un `Resize` evento, ma anche in risposta ad altre modifiche che hanno effetto sul layout del controllo.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Layout>

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> is in virtual mode and a search is taking place.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica quando il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"> </xref> è in modalità virtuale e si sta eseguendo una ricerca.

trans-unit.source: This event occurs when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in virtual mode and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento si verifica quando un <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>è in modalità virtuale e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A>o <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A>metodo viene chiamato.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView>

trans-unit.source: When handling this event, you should calculate which item from the list of items supplied by the Items property matches the search criteria and set the `SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index` property to the index of the ListViewItem.
trans-unit.target: Quando si gestisce questo evento, è necessario calcolare quale elemento dall'elenco di elementi forniti dalla proprietà Items corrisponde ai criteri di ricerca e set di `SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index` proprietà per l'indice dell'oggetto ListViewItem.

trans-unit.source: If an item is not provided, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A> and FindItemWithText will return a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: Se non viene fornito un elemento, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A>e FindItemWithText restituirà un riferimento null (Nothing in Visual Basic).</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem.FindNearestItem%2A>

trans-unit.source: When you change the focus by using the keyboard (TAB, SHIFT+TAB, and so on), by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> methods, or by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> property to the current form, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Leave> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> When you change the focus by using the mouse or by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A> method, focus events occur in the following order: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Enter> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Leave> <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> `Validated` If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> and `Validated` events are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Quando si modifica lo stato attivo dalla tastiera (TAB, MAIUSC + TAB e così via), chiamando la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>o metodi <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A>, o impostando la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A>sul form corrente, si verificano gli eventi di attivazione nell'ordine seguente: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Leave><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> `Validated` <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus>quando si modifica lo stato attivo usando il mouse o chiamando il metodo <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Focus%2A>, gli eventi di stato attivo si verificano nell'ordine seguente: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Enter><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus><xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Leave><xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> `Validated` se la proprietà <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A>è impostata su `false` , il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating>e `Validated` vengono soppressi.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CausesValidation%2A> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.LostFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Leave> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.GotFocus> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Enter> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ContainerControl.ActiveControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.SelectNextControl%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Select%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>è impostato su `true` nel <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating>delegato dell'evento, tutti gli eventi che in genere si verificano dopo il <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating>evento verranno soppressi.</xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> </xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.ListViewArray.Validating> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property of the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> is set to `true` in the Validating event delegate, all events that would usually occur after the Validating event are suppressed.
trans-unit.target: Se il <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>proprietà del <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs>è impostato su `true` nel delegato dell'evento di convalida, vengono eliminati tutti gli eventi che in genere si verificano dopo l'evento Validating.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs> </xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>
